Pre-Game Insights: The Charlotte Hornets are aiming to beat the Detroit Pistons, with star players LaMelo Ball, Brandon Miller, and Miles Bridges leading the charge.
The Pistons feature Cade Cunningham, Jaden Ivey, and Tobias Harris, who pose a strong challenge.
